featured.text: Which of the following statements is true according to the passage? (A) Rapid speech without mistakes is a reliable sign of intelligence.
Speech that is slow, because it is laced with pauses or errors, is a more reliable indicator of lying than the opposite. 41.
The results of this survey are not reliable because the people it questioned were not a typical or _____ sample of the entire population that was studied.

definition.en_def: Consistently good in quality or performance; able to be trusted.
definition.example: She is a reliable friend who always keeps her promises.
